name: nova scotia
blurb:
Nova Scotia is one of three Canadian maritime provinces. It is located at the eastern side of canada bordering the atlantic ocean. It is located at 44ยบ 39' N Longitude which is centered between the equator and the north pole.

It has a population of nearly a million which combined with its small relative size(55 000 square kilometers) makes it the province with the second highest population density.
